ðŸ“– Summary: OkHttp is an HTTP client designed for efficiency and reliability. It supports modern HTTP features like HTTP/2 and TLS 1.3, and automatically handles connection pooling, GZIP compression, and response caching. OkHttp is designed to improve application performance and resilience when interacting with networked services.
